name: fuzzblock
description:
Random game where you as a fuzzblock try to teleport to the end of each level because otherwise you are trapped and have nothing else to do.

keep in mind as you play this that this is my first game and I could've done much more to refine it but I wanted to make something else, so I did. I have no intention of working on this game any more than this so I hope you enjoy playing if you do play it.
